caption.title: Ensemble mean monthly average changes in discharge at individual locations in the upper Indus basin (left) and coefficient of variation for the entire ensemble (right).
caption.p: Changes are shown for the near future (2021–2050) and the far future (2071–2100) compared to 1971–2000, for the RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 ensembles. Numbers in parentheses behind the location names refer to the locations in Fig 1.
